scripts.postinstall: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/**/ src/components/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/jQuery/dist/jquery.min.js src/components/jQuery/ && cp -r node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js src/components/popperJs/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css src/components/fonts/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/components/fonts/font-awesome/
